tncLabels.text: By clicking this box and submitting this Member Application Form, you hereby acknowledge and agree that you have read and understood this application and that you willingly accept and agree to all

set out in this Member Application Form (collectively referred to as “these Terms and Conditions”) and the latest version of (1) “Infinitus Kazakhstan Marketing Plan”, (2) “Code of Practice for Distributors”, (3) “Confidentiality and Privacy Policy” and (4) “Return Policy for Distributors” (these latest versions of (1) to (4) are collectively referred to as “

PE Description: Please provide copies of certificate of PE establishment and the latest certificate of registration/notification or their equivalents, if unable to provide such PE documentary proof, provide a screenshot of taxpayer search from State Revenue database (http://kgd.gov.kz/en/services/taxpayer_search/entrepreneur), in support of this application.
